Comment: This is really the best case scenario we can hope for under trump.   He's not going to help anyone without some sort of material value coming the other way. It's the only way to have them invested in any sort of way in the well-being of Ukraine   If this does lead to a ceasefire Russia will break it eventually as they always do. It's not over. They will regroup and rebuild and invade again some point down the line  Zelensky isn't stupid. I'll trust his judgement that he knows what is best for his county here and how to deal with different administrations.   Europe cannot support Ukraine in any serious way on their own. They don't have the money or equipment to do so for the long haul
